installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# ARK: Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates gcc
apt -y install screen

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
curl -sSL -o rcon.c https://www.ryanschulze.net/files/rcon.c
gcc rcon.c -o rcon
chmod ugo+rx rcon
mv rcon /usr/bin

mkdir -p /mnt/server/clusterData
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux

tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux

cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server/Ark01 +app_update 376030 +quit
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server/Ark02 +app_update 376030 +quit
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server/Ark03 +app_update 376030 +quit

curl -sSL -o /mnt/server/start.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/onekintaro/eggs/dev/ArkTripleCluster/scripts/start.sh
curl -sSL -o /mnt/server/stop.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/onekintaro/eggs/dev/ArkTripleCluster/scripts/stop.sh

chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/stop.sh

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
